name: UModelingComponentsEditorSettings
doc: Editor preferences for the Modeling Components plug-in.

GridMode: The type of grid to draw in the viewport for modeling mode tools
NumGridLines: The number of lines to be drawn for the plane
GridSpacing: The space between grid lines in world space
GridScale: The base scale used to determine the size of the hierarchical plane
GridSize: The fraction of the viewport that the grid should occupy if looking at the plane's center
